venue.name: HUB Fire Place Lounge, Plymouth State

item.description: NOTE: i don't know if you have to be a student to participate... Cast your vote for your preferred presidential candidate and learn more about all of the candidates. This event will be held in the HUB Fire Place Lounge on Thursday, December 8, 2011 from 10a.m. - 2p.m. Representatives from at least six presidential campaigns are confirmed to be attending the event: Jon Huntsman, Rick Perry, Buddy Romer, Fred Karger, Ron Paul and Christopher Hill. Other campaign representatives may also be present. http://thisweek.blogs...
item.name: Plymouth State Straw Poll
